headline: Is EPAM Systems (EPAM) Fairly Priced After Recent Mixed Share Price Performance
summary: If you are wondering whether EPAM Systems is attractively priced or just fairly valued at around US$221.40, this article walks through what the current share price might mean for long term investors. The stock has returned 1.5% over the past week and 4.4% over the last month, with a 10.4% gain year to date but a 3.2% decline over the past year and deeper falls over the last 3 and 5 years. These mixed returns sit against an ongoing market conversation about EPAM Systems position in the global...
